articles.title: Israel receives coffin Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body - BBC
articles.description: Israeli-American soldier Itay Chen's remains were returned to Israel via the Red Cross in Gaza on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The body of a hostage returned by Hamas via the Red Cross in Gaza has been identified as Israeli-American soldier Itay Chen, Israel has confirmed. 
The 19-year-old soldier's remains were returned on… [+2563 chars]
